author: Techno Tim
description:
I took the UniFi Travel Router (UTR) and set it up the way I’d actually use it: bind to my home site with Teleport, bring my SSID with me, and even record a G6 Instant back to my UNVR. Also tested WiFi uplink vs wired WAN vs USB phone tethering.

UniFi Travel Router: https://store.ui.com/us/en/products/utr?a_aid=TechnoTim (affiliate link)
UniFi Cloud Gateways: https://store.ui.com/us/en/category/all-cloud-gateways?a_aid=TechnoTim (affiliate link)

The UTR was sent to me for testing.

title: UniFi Travel Router: My Network Follows Me
